title: Product Manager, YouTube Growth and UX Platform
description: At Google, we put our users first. The world is always changing, so we need Product Managers who are continuously adapting and excited to work on products that affect millions of people every day.
key_qualifications: Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience. 3 years of experience in product management or related technical role. 1 year of experience working cross-functionally with marketing. 1 year of experience launching consumer-facing UIs.
preferred_qualifications: Master’s degree or PhD in a Technology or Business related field. 2 years of experience in a role preparing and delivering technical presentations to executive leadership. 2 years of experience working cross-functionally with engineering, UX/UI, sales, finance, and other stakeholders. 1 year of experience in software development or engineering. Experience launching Generative AI features. Experience with marketing asset generation or user ad interfaces.
responsibilities: Lead formats roadmap, including UX modernization, feature growth, and quality measurements. Work with Product Managers, UX, and Team Leads from major surfaces (e.g., Shorts, Home, Watch Next, Living Room). Work with marketing to launch new format capabilities and ensure adoption across campaigns running through the Growth Platform. Build the Growth Platform artwork and copy generation tools powered by Generative AI to improve creatives and allow the team to scale. Lead Growth Platform contributions to annual main app redesign launches by working with UXR/UX to define test candidates and roadmap.
